thread.title: BRIEF-ShiftPixy Says Co Is Developing Financial And Insurance Transaction And Metering Platform

title: BRIEF-ShiftPixy Says Co Is Developing Financial And Insurance Transaction And Metering Platform

organizations.name: brief-shiftpixy says co is developing financial
insurance transaction and metering platform reuters

text: March 9, 2018 / 1:08 PM / Updated 14 minutes ago BRIEF-ShiftPixy Says Co Is Developing Financial And Insurance Transaction And Metering Platform Reuters Staff March 9 (Reuters) - ShiftPixy Inc: * SHIFTPIXY INC - IS DEVELOPING A FINANCIAL AND INSURANCE TRANSACTION AND METERING PLATFORM * SHIFTPIXY - CO HAS NEVER, DOES NOT NOW, WILL NEVER USE ITS BLOCKCHAIN TECHNOLOGY IN ANY FORM OF CRYPTOCURRENCY OR CRYPTOCURRENCY RELATED APPLICATION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
